name: Is the Advanced Certified Scrum Master Certification Worth It?
description: When evaluating whether Advanced Certified ScrumMaster (A-CSM) training and certification are worth the investment, consider that Certified ScrumMaster training teaches the basics of the Scrum framework and Agile methodology, but is limited in its range beyond that. The Advanced training (A-CSM) goes much further and helps Scrum Masters learn how to put Scrum principles into ...
